title: (2) Schlage ND91PD RHO 626 (Rhodes) Vandlgard Entrance/Office Lever Lock - Retail over $1,200
item_description:
(2) Schlage ND91PD RHO 626 (Rhodes) Vandlgard Entrance/Office Lever Lock - Retail over $1,200

Seller States: Both are Brand new - High Retail

Schlage ND91PD RHO Grade-1 Cylindrical Lever Lock, Entrance/Office Function, Rhodes Vandlgard Lever

The ND Series is ANSI/BHMA Grade 1 certified and performs beyond the Grade 1 standards. The Schlage ND is regularly used in healthcare, education, government, office, retail, and other commercial applications.

Vandlgard™ trim is specifically designed for highly abusive environments. The outside lever rotates freely up and down when locked, limiting the ability of vandals to apply excessive force to the chassis.

ANSI Function F82 – Push-button locking. Push-button disengages outside lever until unlocked with key or by turning inside lever. Vandlgard allows outside spindle to disengage from latch when locked. Inside lever always free for immediate egress.

  • Significantly exceeds ANSI/BHMA Grade 1 requirements
  • Withstands 3,100 in-lb. of abusive lever torque, as well as 1,600 lbs. of offset lever pull for protection against pry bar attacks
  • Not only strong from attacks, but it also shows nearly zero droop or wobble after 16 million cycles
  • The strongest cylindrical lock Schlage has ever built
